QuestData.Title: Mountainstrider Round-Up
QuestData.Description:
Stranger! You are the one I have heard of?
When the kerfuffle with the drogbar happened, some of the young moose ran off!
I can't chase them down or the others might wander off as well.
Could you bring them back here?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find $1oa Frightened Mountainstriders and return them to Liza Galestride's stable.
QuestData.CompletionText: The moose are already broken. Just hop in the saddle and you can bring them here to me!
